data.title: Geoff Love And His Orchestra – Big Concerto Movie Themes
data.meta_description: Geoff Love And His Orchestra, 'Big Concerto Movie Themes' - vinyl record, 12", 33 1/3 RPM, LP - NEAR MINT  record & sleeve condition! which includes: 						A1			 			Warsaw Concerto			Composed By – Addinsell										A2			 			Rhapsody On A Theme Of Paganini			Composed By – Rachmaninov										A3			 			Spellbound Concerto			Composed By – Rozsa										A4			 			Piano Concerto No.1			Arranged By – Love			Composed By – Tchaikovsky										B1			 			Cornish Rhapsody			Composed By – Bath										B2			 			Dream Of Olwen			Composed By – Williams										B3			 			Legend Of The Glass Mountain			Composed By – Rota										B4			 			The Way To The Stars			Composed By – Brodzsky										B5			 			Piano Concerto			Arranged By – Love			Composed By – Grieg						 Label: Music For Pleasure - MFP 5261Format: Vinyl, 12", LP,Stereo, English PressingCountry: UKReleased: 1972Genre: Classical, Stage & ScreenStyle: Theme CompaniesPrinted & Made By - Garrod & Lofthouse International Ltd.Manufactured By - EMIPublished By – Keith Prowse, Schott & Co., Chappell & Co., Elcien Music Ltd., Bosworth, World Music, Lawrence Wright, Chappell & Co. Ltd. Creditsllustration – Barry GlynnPiano, Soloist – Robert DockerProducer – Norman NewellProducer [Assistant Producer] – Gil KingSleeve Notes – Alan WarnerSleeve, Design – Jack Wood NotesMade in EnglandA Supertunes ProductionLabels have more complete titles that sleeve. Barcode & other identifiersRights Society: MCPSRights Society: BriticoRights Society: NCBMatrix / Runout (Side 1 label identifier): SMFP 5261 AMatrix / Runout (Side 1 label identifier): SMFP 5261 BMatrix / Runout (Side 1 runout stamped): SMFP 5261 A-2Matrix / Runout (Side 2 runout stamped): SMFP 5261 B-1 This record is in NEAR MINT condition. The covers are in NEAR MINT condition, BUT HAVING SOME SIGNS OF TIME, WITH ADDITIONAL PROTECTIVE SLEEVE. THE VINYL IS BOTH CLEAN AND SHINY WITH NO DEEP SCRATCHES.
data.text: We are a British Company with a registered office in London, while the manufacturing unit is near Glasgow. We are exclusively b2c; this means that our products are available only from us, no mid men; we design, manufacture and sell directly to the end-user.
